data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3161452,"name":"","username":"cv2473","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/c/dfb087/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-03-10T01:40:53.977Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eOur robot’s limelight (2.0) has suddenly become unresponsive. As of two days ago, it was working fine and streaming to Shuffleboard, but yesterday, it suddenly stopped responding. It doesn’t show up on CameraServer in Shuffleboard, and our team’s limelight website (the IP address that looks like 10.24.73 . . .) doesn’t connect either— it just says No Internet. We’ve tried replacing the ethernet cable, flashing the limelight with Balena Etcher, and resetting the power button. When we hold the reset button down, the official website says that the LEDs are supposed to flash, but nothing happens at all. Someone mentioned that the limelight fell face-first yesterday. Has our Limelight broken? Do we need to get a new one or is there some way to fix this?\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":2,"updated_at":"2023-03-10T01:40:53.977Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":15,"reads":25,"readers_count":24,"score":80.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":429668,"topic_slug":"limelight-unresponsive-and-not-connecting","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":57886,"hidden":false,"trust_level":0,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/limelight-unresponsive-and-not-connecting/429668/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3328290,"name":"system","username":"system","avatar_template":"/uploads/default/original/4X/9/3/2/93234578e69f55873c63fc00fe2d0d85f23bce55.png","created_at":"2024-03-09T01:41:47.377Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eThis topic was automatically closed 365 days after the last reply.
